mapper.select: SELECT teacher_tb.tname FROM teacher_tb, user_tb WHERE teacher_tb.tno = user_tb.account AND user_tb.account = #{account}
SELECT manager_tb.mname FROM manager_tb, user_tb WHERE manager_tb.mno = user_tb.account AND user_tb.account = #{account}
SELECT DISTINCT role_tb.`code` FROM role_tb, user_tb WHERE role_tb.id = user_tb.role_id AND user_tb.account = #{account}

SELECT DISTINCT permission_tb.`code` FROM user_tb, role_perm_tb, permission_tb WHERE user_tb.role_id = role_perm_tb.role_id AND role_perm_tb.perm_id = permission_tb.id AND user_tb.account = #{account}
